entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The main antagonist, referred to as the Dark Lord, is a powerful wizard who has ordered Snape to spy on Dumbledore.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a character who seems hesitant and discomfited when questioned by Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the one questioning Bellatrix and seems to be confident in his answers.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character who Snape has been ordered by the Dark Lord to spy on.

entities.name: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school where Snape was ordered to be when the Dark Lord fell.

relationships.description: The Dark Lord has ordered Snape to spy on Dumbledore.
Snape was ordered by the Dark Lord to spy on Dumbledore.
